itunes:title: Bonus Episode: Knights of X (feat. Tini Howard)
title: Bonus Episode: Knights of X (feat. Tini Howard)
itunes:author: Connor Goldsmith
description:
To celebrate the launch of Knights of X this coming Wednesday, I've decided to share this Patreon bonus episode with the world! This was originally published on April 1st for the House of Zaladane tier ($5/month) at patreon.com/cerebrocast

In this CEREBRO Secret File, Tini Howard chats with me about the end of Excalibur, the upcoming sequel Knights of X, her current run on Catwoman, and much much more. 

Please make sure you pick up Knights of X #1 this week, and preorder #2 at your local comic shop! We are in an unprecedented printing crisis and preorder numbers matter more than ever right now. I love this book and I think you will too.



Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
